definition[0]: a narrow band of strong material that is used to fasten, hang, or hold onto something
example[1]: The strap of my bag is broken.
definition[1]: to fasten something or someone in place with one or more straps
example[2]: soldiers with grenades strapped to their belts
example[4]: He was only ten when he strapped on a guitar for the first time.
definition[2]: to tie bandages firmly round a part of your body that has been hurt
explanation[0]: Strap is often used in the passive
